author: David Gilbert, chloe angyal
title: Hairdryers, Incense, and Garlic Water: Facebook Is Still Letting People Spread Fake Coronavirus ‘Cures’
description: Facebook said it would fix its dangerous coronavirus misinformation problem, but a new report reveals how badly it's failing.
content:
Want the best of VICE News straight to your inbox? Sign up here.
Have you heard the good news? Coronavirus is destroyed by chlorine dioxide. And black people are resistant to it. Have you got a hairdryer? Good, because those can also be used to prevent coron… [+6499 chars]
